Welcome to p13_oc_r0b1n's documentation!
========================================

.. image:: assets/main_pic.png
   :alt: Orange County Lettings Main Picture
   :align: center


This documentation is written to understand the code behind the Orange Country Lettings website.

This website is designed for a start-up offering real estate rentals.

Orange Country Lettings is quickly growing in the United States, feel free to `jump in <BL94_>`__ and start looking for your future letting !

.. _BL94: https://p13-oc.onrender.com/
